channel.title: Disconnection
channel.description: Ok, it seems whenever a user has say, phead=-100, which is also in the hide command, it dc's everyone around, because their name gets changed to: vyflkeeyfi08, level gets bugged, etc. and when the person moves, everyone in area get's dcd. So I removed the command from server, but today a user came on, with some kind of client, which somehow, set him as that status, phead-100(all body parts), his level was -629, and name vyflkeeyfi08. He was demanding stuff and whatnot, I ip banned, but I would like to know how to fix. Make it so it won't dc users when he moves.

item.title: Disconnection
item.dc:creator: @LawGamer LawGamer
item.description:
@LawGamer wrote:

Ok, it seems whenever a user has say, phead=-100, which is also in the hide command, it dc’s everyone around, because their name gets changed to: vyflkeeyfi08, level gets bugged, etc. and when the person moves, everyone in area get’s dcd. So I removed the command from server, but today a user came on, with some kind of client, which somehow, set him as that status, phead-100(all body parts), his level was -629, and name vyflkeeyfi08. He was demanding stuff and whatnot, I ip banned, but I would like to know how to fix. Make it so it won’t dc users when he moves.
